  Manages a Tama Thought Path resource
---

# tama_thought_path (Resource)

Manages a Tama Thought Path resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example configuration for tama_modular_thought_path resource

terraform {
  required_providers {
    tama = {
      source = "upmaru/tama"
    }
  }
}

# Create a space for the AI processing
resource "tama_space" "ai_workspace" {
  name = "Content Processing Workspace"
  type = "root"
}

# Create a chain for content processing
resource "tama_chain" "content_pipeline" {
  space_id = tama_space.ai_workspace.id
  name     = "Content Analysis Pipeline"
}

# Create target classes for different types of connections
resource "tama_class" "content_categories" {
  space_id = tama_space.ai_workspace.id
  schema_json = jsonencode({
    title       = "Content Categories"
    description = "Schema for content classification results"
    type        = "object"
    properties = {
      category = {
        type        = "string"
        description = "Content category name"
        enum        = ["technology", "science", "business", "entertainment", "sports"]
      }
      confidence = {
        type        = "number"
        description = "Classification confidence score"
        minimum     = 0
        maximum     = 1
      }
      subcategory = {
        type        = "string"
        description = "Subcategory within the main category"
      }
      keywords = {
        type        = "array"
        description = "Relevant keywords for the category"
        items = {
          type = "string"
        }
      }
    }
    required = ["category", "confidence"]
  })
}

resource "tama_class" "similar_content" {
  space_id = tama_space.ai_workspace.id
  schema_json = jsonencode({
    title       = "Similar Content"
    description = "Schema for similar content recommendations"
    type        = "object"
    properties = {
      title = {
        type        = "string"
        description = "Content title"
      }
      similarity_score = {
        type        = "number"
        description = "Similarity score between 0 and 1"
        minimum     = 0
        maximum     = 1
      }
      url = {
        type        = "string"
        description = "Content URL"
        format      = "uri"
      }
      excerpt = {
        type        = "string"
        description = "Brief excerpt from the content"
      }
      published_date = {
        type        = "string"
        description = "Publication date"
        format      = "date"
      }
    }
    required = ["title", "similarity_score"]
  })
}

resource "tama_class" "extracted_entities" {
  space_id = tama_space.ai_workspace.id
  schema_json = jsonencode({
    title       = "Extracted Entities"
    description = "Schema for extracted entities from content"
    type        = "object"
    properties = {
      entities = {
        type        = "array"
        description = "List of extracted entities"
        items = {
          type = "object"
          properties = {
            text = {
              type        = "string"
              description = "Entity text"
            }
            type = {
              type        = "string"
              description = "Entity type"
              enum        = ["person", "organization", "location", "date", "money"]
            }
            confidence = {
              type        = "number"
              description = "Extraction confidence"
              minimum     = 0
              maximum     = 1
            }
          }
          required = ["text", "type", "confidence"]
        }
      }
      entity_count = {
        type        = "integer"
        description = "Total number of entities extracted"
      }
    }
    required = ["entities"]
  })
}

# Create thoughts for processing content
resource "tama_modular_thought" "content_analyzer" {
  chain_id = tama_chain.content_pipeline.id
  relation = "analysis"

  module {
    reference = "tama/agentic/generate"
    parameters = jsonencode({
      relation = "analysis"
    })
  }
}

resource "tama_modular_thought" "content_classifier" {
  chain_id = tama_chain.content_pipeline.id
  relation = "classification"

  module {
    reference = "tama/agentic/generate"
    parameters = jsonencode({
      relation = "classification"
    })
  }
}

resource "tama_modular_thought" "content_extractor" {
  chain_id = tama_chain.content_pipeline.id
  relation = "extraction"

  module {
    reference = "tama/agentic/generate"
    parameters = jsonencode({
      relation = "extraction"
    })
  }
}

# Basic path without parameters
resource "tama_modular_thought_path" "simple_connection" {
  thought_id      = tama_modular_thought.content_analyzer.id
  target_class_id = tama_class.content_categories.id
}

# Path with similarity parameters for content recommendations
resource "tama_modular_thought_path" "analysis_to_similar" {
  thought_id      = tama_modular_thought.content_analyzer.id
  target_class_id = tama_class.similar_content.id

  parameters = jsonencode({
    relation = "similarity"
    similarity = {
      threshold = 0.7
      algorithm = "cosine"
    }
    max_results = 15
    sort_by     = "score"
  })
}

# Path with classification parameters
resource "tama_modular_thought_path" "classifier_to_categories" {
  thought_id      = tama_modular_thought.content_classifier.id
  target_class_id = tama_class.content_categories.id

  parameters = jsonencode({
    relation             = "classification"
    confidence_threshold = 0.9
    multi_label          = true
    categories           = ["technology", "science", "business"]
  })
}

# Path with extraction parameters
resource "tama_modular_thought_path" "extractor_to_entities" {
  thought_id      = tama_modular_thought.content_extractor.id
  target_class_id = tama_class.extracted_entities.id

  parameters = jsonencode({
    relation             = "extraction"
    extract_types        = ["person", "organization", "location"]
    confidence_threshold = 0.8
    max_entities         = 50
  })
}

# Path with complex filtering for high-quality similar content
resource "tama_modular_thought_path" "filtered_similarity" {
  thought_id      = tama_modular_thought.content_analyzer.id
  target_class_id = tama_class.similar_content.id

  parameters = jsonencode({
    relation = "similarity"
    similarity = {
      threshold = 0.8
      algorithm = "semantic"
    }
    filters = {
      category          = ["technology", "ai"]
      published_after   = "2023-01-01"
      min_quality_score = 0.7
    }
    max_results  = 10
    sort_by      = "relevance"
    boost_recent = true
  })
}

# Output the path information
output "simple_connection_path_id" {
  description = "ID of the simple connection path"
  value       = tama_modular_thought_path.simple_connection.id
}

output "analysis_similar_path_id" {
  description = "ID of the analysis to similar content path"
  value       = tama_modular_thought_path.analysis_to_similar.id
}

output "classifier_categories_path_id" {
  description = "ID of the classifier to categories path"
  value       = tama_modular_thought_path.classifier_to_categories.id
}

output "extractor_entities_path_id" {
  description = "ID of the extractor to entities path"
  value       = tama_modular_thought_path.extractor_to_entities.id
}

output "filtered_similarity_path_id" {
  description = "ID of the filtered similarity path"
  value       = tama_modular_thought_path.filtered_similarity.id
}

output "content_categories_class_id" {
  description = "ID of the content categories class"
  value       = tama_class.content_categories.id
}

output "similar_content_class_id" {
  description = "ID of the similar content class"
  value       = tama_class.similar_content.id
}

output "extracted_entities_class_id" {
  description = "ID of the extracted entities class"
  value       = tama_class.extracted_entities.id
}

output "analyzer_thought_id" {
  description = "ID of the content analyzer thought"
  value       = tama_modular_thought.content_analyzer.id
}

output "classifier_thought_id" {
  description = "ID of the content classifier thought"
  value       = tama_modular_thought.content_classifier.id
}

output "extractor_thought_id" {
  description = "ID of the content extractor thought"
  value       = tama_modular_thought.content_extractor.id
}

output "chain_id" {
  description = "ID of the content processing chain"
  value       = tama_chain.content_pipeline.id
}

output "workspace_id" {
  description = "ID of the AI workspace"
  value       = tama_space.ai_workspace.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `target_class_id` (String) ID of the target class for this path
- `thought_id` (String) ID of the thought this path belongs to

### Optional

- `parameters` (String) Path parameters as JSON string (e.g., '{"similarity": {"threshold": 0.9}}')

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Path identifier
